help:
This bot was written by CrashBash, contact him for adding content. Publicly advertised commands:
!bb, !bbstore, !pms, !gc+, !wii, !revisions, !trim, !trim6, !usb, !18650
pms:
The PMS is a custom board designed by Gman that has the combined functionality of voltage regulation and battery management all in a small easy to use board. It is avaiable to purchase from teh BB-store.
<https://store.bitbuilt.net/rvl-power-management-system/>
usb: This is the best drive the community has found regarding PortabilizeMii support: <https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0028R3NCU/>
18650: These are recommended batteries for use with a PMS: <https://mabdelectronics.com/collections/samsung-sdi-18650-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-batteries/products/samsung-inr-18650-35e-8a-3500mah-high-drain-flat-top-rechargeable-battery>
joyconsoldering:
This is the kind of soldering required for creating GC Joycons.
https://bitbuilt.net/forums/index.php?attachments/joyconsolder-jpg.10489/
